title: LF Adc to duo with
body:
Sgarn, i am a support/jungle main with preference for supporting.  {{champion:201}} {{champion:40}} 
I want someone who actually mains ADC and knows how to carry games to duo with, i've mained support since season 3 so i have a somewhat decent feel for it just playing casually. Season 5 i was Gold 3, Season 6 i finished my promos in Silver 2 and lost interest in league for a little while, while i was busy with life stuff. I have skype, choof bills, enjoy mad bants, don't ever rage and enjoy learning the game and developing mechanical skill.

Preferably someone who has carried themselves to gold playing adc, but beggers can't be choosers so if you're a mad dawg and know where/when to right click some stuff i'd like to get you fed af. Braum and Janna, are my go-to supports but i have a pretty good feel for all of them. 

i can keep u alive
i can help u secure ur kills
i can b ur dad

replies.body: im willing to play with ya but im only bronze 3. I am willing to learn more about the game tho.1
